name: Wheelie Bike 3D - BMX stunts
description:
Experience the thrill of bicycle wheelies in our latest bike racing game! Wheelie Bike 3D will test your skill to the limit. How far can you perform wheelie with your bicycle? Can you impress everyone as you rampage through the city tracks? Play our bike game and find out!
HOW TO PLAY: Tilt your phone to steer your bike to left or right. Meanwhile, you can perform wheelies with the buttons.
========================================================
FEATURES OF Wheelie Bike 3D
========================================================
Easy to play, Hard to master.
Fun physics and graphics.

Unlock various bikes.
Get coins to unlock more bikes.
Customize them
Various tracks and roads to play.
Set your graphic to Low or High depending on your phone type.
Intuitive and response game control.
See how you perform compared to other players on Online Leaderboards.

Our Motorsport game is very addictive and realistic. If you want to experience extreme bike racing game, this is the game that you should try. Riding a bike is definitely more challenging than even the most extreme car driving simulator or even off road legends. That’s because you have to control everything at once: your direction, the speed, and how you throttle. To succeed as drift racer, you must give your 100% attention.
If you are a gamer who doesn’t back down from a challenge, then this game is perfect for you! So, if you are ready to take on this challenge, download our formula drift racing game now!
